data.title: Death Angel: 'Left For Dead' Music Video Released
data.meta_description: San Francisco Bay Area thrash veterans DEATH ANGEL, have released a brand new video clip for the track “Left For Dead” at below: The song is taken from the band’s recently released seventh studio album The Dream Calls for Blood, and comes on the verge of their upcoming tour with CHILDREN OF BODOM. Commented guitarist... Read more »
data.text:
San Francisco Bay Area thrash veterans DEATH ANGEL, have released a brand new video clip for the track “Left For Dead” at below:

The song is taken from the band’s recently released seventh studio album The Dream Calls for Blood, and comes on the verge of their upcoming tour with CHILDREN OF BODOM. Commented guitarist Rob Cavestany:

“We would like to present to you our new video for the song ‘Left For Dead’ – the opening track off our latest record The Dream Calls for Blood. Directed by none other than Tommy Jones at VideoHammer Studios, it is comprised of footage filmed at AudioHammer Studios in Florida during the recording of the album. Catch a glimpse into our world in the recording studio as we create, collaborate, lay down tracks and attempt to survive the insane madness of making a DEATH ANGEL album! Hope you enjoy this little morsel that we proudly serve up to you as an appetizer – catch the main course when we hit your town on tour which kicks off this Thursday! 8 weeks across North America – plenty of chances to feast upon us… bon appétit and see you in the pit!”

“Halo Of Blood Over North America” Tour

The Dream Calls For Blood sold 5,400 copies in the United States in its first week of release to land at position No. 72 on The Billboard 200 chart. This now makes it the band’s highest charting record since their reformation in 2004! In contrast the group’s previous CD, Relentless Retribution, opened with 2,700 units in September 2010 and came in at No. 188.

The Dream Calls for Bloodwas recorded at AudioHammer Studios with Jason Suecof (TRIVIUM, AUGUST BURNS RED, THE BLACK DAHLIA MURDER, ALL THAT REMAINS, WHITECHAPEL, DEVILDRIVER), and once again features cover art by Brent Elliot White (JOB FOR A COWBOY,CARNIFEX, WHITECHAPEL).

The Dream Calls for Blood is out now.

The Dream Calls for Blood Track List:

01. Left for Dead

02. Son of the Morning

03. Fallen

04. The Dream Calls for Blood

05. Succubus

06. Execution / Don’t Save Me

07. Caster of Shame

08. Detonate

09. Empty

10. Territorial Instinct / Bloodlust

DIGIPAK BONUS TRACK

11. Heaven and Hell
